This variant of '''Chilled Meat''' is a quest item that can be obtained during  one of the following [[event]]s:
*[[Flavor of the Month]] by helping [[Terrified Schuster]].
*[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part III]] by helping [[Cloud Retainer]].
